scripts.build: rm -rf ./TEST && mkdir ./TEST && cd ./TEST && deno run --unstable -A ../src/index.ts build react . --ts --scss --skip
scripts.add: rm -rf ./TEST && mkdir ./TEST && cd ./TEST && deno run --unstable -A ../src/index.ts add license afl
scripts.update: deno uninstall sculptr && deno install --unstable -A -n sculptr -f https://deno.land/x/sculptr/src/index.ts
